articles.author: Sadakshi Kalyan Ramun
articles.title: Worlds 2022 Play-in Qualifier 1: NA>EU Roars Evil Geniuses at MAD Lions - AFK Gaming
articles.description: Evil Geniuses rewrote LoL Esports history by winning against a European team in a BO5 series at Worlds 2022. It won against MAD Lions with a 3-0 scoreline.
articles.content: There was action on the lower half of the map initiated by both EG and MAD Lions but the first blood fell only at 8.40 minutes as MAD Lions collapsed on Joseph Joon "jojopyun" Pyun. But EG secured th… [+745 chars]

articles.title: Apple forced to change charger in Europe as EU approves overhaul - iTnews
articles.content:
Apple will have to change the charger for its iPhones in the European Union from autumn 2024 to comply with new rules introducing a single charging port for most electronic devices.
The reform passe… [+3018 chars]

articles.title: EU moves ahead with plans to standardize phone chargers by 2024 - CBC News
articles.description: The European Parliament approved new rules on Tuesday that will introduce a single charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in the EU by 2024, a world first that is expected to affect iPhone maker Apple more than its rivals.
articles.content: The European Parliament approved new rules on Tuesday that will introduce a single charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in the EU by 2024, a world first that is expected to affect iPh… [+1599 chars]

articles.title: Grippe aviaire : un nombre sans précédent de cas cet été en Europe - EFSA
articles.description: An unprecedented number of highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) virus detections were reported in wild and domestic birds from June to September in Europe, according to the latest overview.
articles.content: Un nombre sans précédent de détections du virus de l'influenza aviaire hautement pathogène (IAHP) ont été signalées chez des oiseaux sauvages et domestiques de juin à septembre en Europe, selon le de… [+4386 chars]
